description: MySQL PDM for Party domain in the Master Data Management system

columns.name: party_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the party (UUID)

columns.name: party_name
columns.description: The name of the party as it is known in business

columns.name: party_type
columns.description: Type of party (Person or Organization)

columns.name: party_date_time
columns.description: Date and time when the party record was created

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the party

columns.name: data_source_system
columns.description: System where this party data originated

columns.name: data_source_id
columns.description: ID of this party in the source system

columns.name: is_golden_record
columns.description: Flag indicating if this is the golden record

columns.name: data_quality_score
columns.description: Calculated data quality score from 0-100

columns.name: confidence_score
columns.description: Confidence level in the correctness of this record

columns.name: last_verified_date
columns.description: Date when this record was last verified

columns.name: party_identification
columns.description: A general identification for the party (e.g., TaxID)

columns.name: data_steward_id
columns.description: ID of the data steward responsible for this party

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Date and time when this record was created

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: User who created this record

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Date and time when this record was last updated

columns.name: updated_by
columns.description: User who last updated this record

columns.name: deleted_at
columns.description: Date and time when this record was marked as deleted

columns.name: party_id
columns.description: Foreign key to the Party entity

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: First name of the person

columns.name: middle_name
columns.description: Middle name of the person

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: Last name of the person

columns.name: given_name
columns.description: Given name of the person (if different from first name)

columns.name: family_name
columns.description: Family name of the person (if different from last name)

columns.name: birth_date
columns.description: Date of birth

columns.name: gender
columns.description: Gender of the person

columns.name: marital_status
columns.description: Marital status of the person

columns.name: nationality
columns.description: Nationality of the person

columns.name: residence_country
columns.description: Country of residence

columns.name: ethnicity
columns.description: Ethnicity of the person

columns.name: religion
columns.description: Religion of the person

columns.name: preferred_language
columns.description: Preferred language for communication

columns.name: residential_status
columns.description: Residential status in the country of residence
